name: Jocation
overview:
Overview:

Jocation enables user to search courses offered by 127 HEC recognized universities in Pakistan. It also provides career advice/ Internship opportunites and information about 29 countries around the globe. The study abroad section information targets Pakistani students and provides country overview, visa requirement and enables user to search the courses offered by Universities in that country. The course details page lists the entry requirement and course description and direct link to Universityâ€™s website.

Mission:

Jocation is a project which delivers Educational and career advice to Pakistani students. Jocation aims to deliver the information to Pakistani students which help them in choosing the right course/programme and institute.

Course/Programme Section:

The course/programme section enables users to search courses/programmes they are interested in and help them decide which course/programme and university to choose. Users can search both undergraduate and postgraduate courses offered by HEC recognized universities in Pakistan. There are over 3000 courses/programmes to search from, users can filter their search results based on the institute, subjects and type of courses e.g. Undergraduate or Postgraduate.

Career Section: The career advice section provides detailed information about different Job sectors. In sector information page user can find sector related Employers, Types of Jobs, Subjects and Courses. The section also provides information on the different types of Jobs, top employers in Pakistan, Industry Insight and other useful information like Job Interview tips, CV Writing and Job hunting advice.

Study Abroad Section: The study abroad section provides information about 29 different countries, user can search courses offered by several Universities in those countries. The â€œcountry specific informationâ€ provides information about the country which provides information related to Pakistani Students.
